content: दर्दुरः [दृणाति कर्णौ शब्देन उरच् नि° <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A frog; पंकक्लिन्नमुखाः पिबंति सलिलं धाराहता दर्दुराः <ls>Mk. 5. 14.</ls> {@--2@} A cloud. {@--3@} A kind of musical instrument such as a flute. {@--4@} A mountain. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a mountain in the south (associated with Malaya); स्तनाविव दिशस्तस्याः शैलौमलयदर्दुरौ <ls>R. 4. 51.</ls> {@--6@} The sound of a drum. {@--7@} A sort of rice. --रा, --री <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. --रं A group or assembly of villages, district, province.
